subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After easily winning the first set, Serena Williams struggled after a brief rain delay before regaining her championship form to beat Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-1, 5-7, 6-2.
snippet: After easily winning the first set, Serena Williams struggled after a brief rain delay before regaining her championship form to beat Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-1, 5-7, 6-2.
